name: Morningstar Flight Academy (Pty) Ltd
about: Morningstar Flight Academy, situated 25km outside of Cape Town's CBD at the Morningstar Airfield, offers comprehensive pilot training programs. We provide training for Private Pilots Licence (PPL), National Pilots Licence (NPL), Microlight Flight Training, and other advanced certifications such as Commercial Pilots Licence (CPL) and Flight Instructor Rating. Our passionate instructors accommodate students on both part-time and full-time basis, available from sunrise to sunset, ensuring personal attention and flexible pacing. The academy operates all year round, Monday to Sunday, closing only for Christmas and New Yearâ€™s Day. With a convenient location in the general flying zone, no time is wasted during training. Our commitment is to make your flying dreams a reality with dedicated and personalized instruction.
